subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Brad Penny struck out a career-high 14 and allowed only five base runners in seven shutout innings to lead the Los Angeles Dodgers to a 6-1 victory against the host Florida Marlins.
snippet: Brad Penny struck out a career-high 14 and allowed only five base runners in seven shutout innings to lead the Los Angeles Dodgers to a 6-1 victory against the host Florida Marlins.
